name: fool
text: A player character is punished for a past action.

name: magician
text: The current player gets something they need.

name: high priestess
text: Something causes the current player to react instinctively.

name: empress
text: A non-player character wants to help the group.

name: emperor
text: A non-player character wants to be in charge.

name: hierophant
text: A non-player character wants to play it safe.

name: lovers
text: The group meets somebody new.

name: chariot
text: The current situation is brought under control.

name: strength
text: Something forces the current player to act rashly.

name: hermit
text: Something affords the current player a moment of calm.

name: wheel of fortune
text: Shuffle the deck. Each player gains an experience point at the end of the session.

name: justice
text: Events here have consequences elsewhere.

name: hanged man
text: The current player must sacrifice something.

name: death
text: A non-player character must make a difficult decision.

name: temperance
text: The group must progress another way.

name: devil
text: The current situation begins to deteriorate.

name: tower
text: The group's progress thus far is threatened.

name: star
text: The current situation requires external influence.

name: moon
text: The current player finds something interesting.

name: sun
text: The group makes good progress.

name: judgement
text: A non-player character's hard work pays off.

name: world
text: A player character is rewarded for a past action.
